character.name: octopus_hero
character.description: cute purple octopus protagonist with big expressive eyes, wearing a red bandana, 8 tentacles, friendly smile, cartoon style

prompts: standing still in relaxed neutral pose
slight bounce upward, one tentacle raised cheerfully
back to neutral position, all tentacles relaxed
other tentacle gives a friendly wave
tentacles extend again for next step
completing walk cycle, ready to repeat
at apex of jump, tentacles spread wide
beginning to fall, tentacles positioning for landing
wind-up pose, one tentacle pulling back
full attack extension, tentacle striking forward
attack impact moment, tentacle at full reach
recovery pose, tentacle returning to ready position
